titleStmt.title: Didascalocophus, or, The deaf and dumb mans tutor to which is added a discourse of the nature and number of double consonants, both which tracts being the first (for what the author knows) that have been published upon either of the subjects / by Geo. Dalgarno.
titleStmt.author: Dalgarno, George, 1626?-1687.
